summary: A girl visiting her sister in Hollywood hopes for a modeling career, but is tricked by pimps into working at a brothel.
cast: Joy Reynolds|Geri Moffatt|Marko Perri|Guy Manford|Lisa Rack|Ted Soares|Sam Rosen|Edward Schaaf|Fred Humphrey|Lyle Kirk|Wayne Winton|Debbie Marshall|Raymond Guth|Norman Wright
title: The Flesh Merchant
